name: Soulkeeper Diaries
description:
Play as a lost explorer, the Dogu and help him to find his way to home while exploring worlds and islands with his balloon. Dogu will find himself between the ancient technology and the bandits.


Cute worlds doesn’t mean cute enemies. Be prepared for dangerous creatures to fight. From traitor pigs to ancient demons, various bosses awaits the Dogu.



Try to find Dogu’s home while travelling through various worlds. Explore flying islands and the power of the portals to get one step closer to home.

Bandits are going to keep pursue Dogu in every world. Befriend with piggies and help them to protect the worlds from bandits and creatures. Collect all of the soulstones from the worlds to escape from bandits and return to home.


Repair and upgrade your equipment to make Dogu stronger. Craft potions and new items to use in combat. Upgrade your balloon to travel across various worlds & survive.
